items.sentence: Optimists see opportunities in disasters while pessimists find disasters in every opportunity.
The students who are occupying the administration building have threatened to kill themselves.
The burning of coal is responsible for more than 40% of Australia\'s greenhouse gas emissions.
When you meet someone for the first time, be careful about how close you stand to that person.
I don\'t know what Tom advised you to do, but I\'d suggest that you don\'t tell Mary about it.
